languages.text:
"Весел оскал и кровавой радости полон.
"За дерзость свою ты заплатишь слезами и кровью" -
Так отвечал грозный дух, и сам ураган
Клятве суровой свидетелем стал неподкупным".

"The grin was merry
and full of bloody joy.
'For your insolence you will pay
with tears and blood.'
—so answered the dread spirit,
and to that harsh oath served
the hurricane itself
as witness incorruptible."
languages.original_text:
"Весел оскал и кровавой радости полон.
"За дерзость свою ты заплатишь слезами и кровью" -

Клятве суровой свидетелем стал неподкупным".

languages.text:
「笑顔は陽気で
血濡れの歓喜に満ちていた。
”その横柄な態度は
涙と血で償ってもらおう”
ーー恐ろしい霊はそう答え
その厳しい誓いに
竜巻そのものが
不滅の証人として現れた」
languages.original_text:
"The grin was merry
and full of bloody joy.
'For your insolence you will pay
with tears and blood.'
—so answered the dread spirit,
and to that harsh oath served
the hurricane itself
as witness incorruptible."

traits.locale_text:
「笑顔は陽気で
血濡れの歓喜に満ちていた。
”その横柄な態度は
涙と血で償ってもらおう”
ーー恐ろしい霊はそう答え
その厳しい誓いに
竜巻そのものが
不滅の証人として現れた」

languages.text:
“他露齿而笑，
浸透了血腥的愉悦。
‘你将为你的傲慢，
付出血与泪的代价。’
——邪祟的灵魂如此说道，
严酷的寒风，
似也在为这恶毒的誓言，
作不死不休的见证。”
languages.original_text:
"The grin was merry
and full of bloody joy.
'For your insolence you will pay
with tears and blood.'
—so answered the dread spirit,
and to that harsh oath served
the hurricane itself
as witness incorruptible."

traits.locale_text:

——邪祟的灵魂如此说道，
严酷的寒风，
似也在为这恶毒的誓言，
作不死不休的见证。”

languages.text:
« Son large sourire
trahissait une joie sanguinaire.
"Votre insolence vous coûtera
bien des larmes et du sang,"
répondit l'esprit effroyable,
et de ce serment sans appel
l'ouragan lui-même
se fit l'incorruptible témoin. »
languages.original_text:
"The grin was merry
and full of bloody joy.
'For your insolence you will pay
with tears and blood.'
—so answered the dread spirit,
and to that harsh oath served
the hurricane itself
as witness incorruptible."

traits.locale_text:
« Son large sourire
trahissait une joie sanguinaire.
"Votre insolence vous coûtera
bien des larmes et du sang,"
répondit l'esprit effroyable,
et de ce serment sans appel
l'ouragan lui-même
se fit l'incorruptible témoin. »

languages.text:
«Su sonrisa era jovial,
colmada de cruento goce.
"Por tu insolencia pagarás
con lágrimas y sangre",
respondió el terrible espíritu,
y del despiadado juramento
fue testigo la misma ventisca,
de imparcialidad incuestionable».
languages.original_text:
"The grin was merry
and full of bloody joy.
'For your insolence you will pay
with tears and blood.'
—so answered the dread spirit,
and to that harsh oath served
the hurricane itself
as witness incorruptible."

de imparcialidad incuestionable».

languages.text:
"Das Grinsen war fröhlich
und voll blutiger Freude.
'Für Eure Unverfrorenheit
bezahlt Ihr mit Tränen und Blut.'
So sprach der schreckliche Geist,
und Zeuge dieses harschen Schwurs
war der Orkan selbst,
unumstößlich, wie er ist."
languages.original_text:
"The grin was merry
and full of bloody joy.
'For your insolence you will pay
with tears and blood.'
—so answered the dread spirit,
and to that harsh oath served
the hurricane itself
as witness incorruptible."

unumstößlich, wie er ist."

languages.text:
"Gülümseme şakraktı
ve doluydu kanlı neşeyle.
'Küstahlığının bedelini
ödeyeceksin gözyaşların ve kanınla.'
Diye cevap verdi korkunç ruh.
Bu sert yeminin
yılmaz şahidi,
fırtınanın ta kendisiydi."
languages.original_text:
"The grin was merry
and full of bloody joy.
'For your insolence you will pay
with tears and blood.'
—so answered the dread spirit,
and to that harsh oath served
the hurricane itself
as witness incorruptible."
